page.title: 07HEATHERSIDE SCHOOL AMENITIES
page.content:
HEATHERSIDE SCHOOL{KITCHEN.}It has fryers for chips, steamers for the vegetables, a potato peeler, a slicer for meat, hot cupboards to keep the food warm once it has ben cooked and is ready for serving, and sterilizers to wash the dishes. There are 5 kitchen ladies, and 3 helpers. Pupils serve themselves from a choice of food, like in a canteen. The dinners are 53p and puddings, 12p.
OUR{SECRETARY}is Mrs Elderton. She was interviewed for this survey by pupils. She works a full day typing letters and printing things for school. She makes about 12 phone calls a day and has upto 30 visitors sometimes. She helps to look after sick pupils and takes charge of the dinner-money.
